frontmatter.title: AI co-build
frontmatter.description: AI is reshaping business. As a research-focused tech consultancy, we focus on creating AI solutions that solve real business problems, not just flashy demos that fall apart in production.

form-options.title: Build with us
form-options.subtitle: Let's discuss your ideas. The more specific you are, the faster we can help. Our team will get back to you within 24hrs.

select-fields.label: What kind of AI solution do you need?
select-fields.name: ai_solution_type

options.label: AI-powered products (e.g., chatbots, digital products)
options.description: Intelligent chatbots and assistants that actually help users, AI-powered digital products that enhance user experiences, Custom AI platforms designed for specific industry needs, Agentic systems that can reason and take actions.

options.label: Data & MLOps (e.g., model deployment, data pipelines)
options.description: AI model deployment and optimization for production environments, Data pipelines that feed your AI systems reliably, MLOps and LLMOps for efficient model development and deployment, AI integration with existing systems and workflows.

options.label: Smart automation (e.g., document processing, computer vision)
options.description: Document processing and analysis systems, Content generation and curation tools, Automated decision-making systems, Computer vision applications for real-world problems.

site.title: Dwarves Foundation - We build software with Go, React, K8s, Swift and Flutter
site.description: A software development firm based in Asia. Helping tech startups, entrepreneurs and makers build world-class products since 2013.
